name: car-rental-backend
description: Production-grade microservices backend for car rental platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter @car-rental/gateway dev" "pnpm --filter @car-rental/auth-service dev" "pnpm --filter @car-rental/car-service dev" "pnpm --filter @car-rental/search-service dev" "pnpm --filter @car-rental/booking-service dev" "pnpm --filter @car-rental/notification-service dev"
scripts.migrate:dev: pnpm --filter @car-rental/auth-service migrate:dev && pnpm --filter @car-rental/car-service migrate:dev && pnpm --filter @car-rental/booking-service migrate:dev
scripts.migrate:deploy: pnpm --filter @car-rental/auth-service migrate:deploy && pnpm --filter @car-rental/car-service migrate:deploy && pnpm --filter @car-rental/booking-service migrate:deploy
scripts.prisma:generate: pnpm --filter @car-rental/auth-service prisma:generate && pnpm --filter @car-rental/car-service prisma:generate && pnpm --filter @car-rental/booking-service prisma:generate
scripts.prisma:reset: pnpm --filter @car-rental/auth-service prisma:reset && pnpm --filter @car-rental/car-service prisma:reset && pnpm --filter @car-rental/booking-service prisma:reset

author: Your Name
